title: Scenario-Based Learning for Complex Thinking Grounded in SDGs

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Real-time collaborative learning in smartphone-constrained environments for novice professionals entering medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-life problems linked to SDG 3 (Good Health and Well-Being) and SDG 11 (Sustainable Cities) through mathematical modeling
Learners can write reports evaluating the feasibility of SDG-linked scenarios by applying complex thinking (systems thinking, critical thinking)
Learners can collaborate with peers to design SDG-based problem-solving scenarios and propose improvements through mathematical data analysis

resources: Simple Math Tools App (Graph Calculator, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
